title: Karasuma Street
text: is a major south-north street in central <a href="Kyoto">Kyoto</a>, <a href="Japan">Japan</a>. It is part of <a href="Japan%20National%20Route%2024">National Route 24</a> and <a href="Japan%20National%20Route%20367">National Route 367</a>. The <a href="Karasuma%20Line">Karasuma Line</a> subway runs under the street.
